messages.title: MAKING BREXIT A SUCCESS IS CENTRAL TO OUR NATIONAL INTEREST
messages.content: As a nation, we face the most important period in our lifetime. Making Brexit a success is central to our national interest – and it is central to your own security and prosperity.

messages.title: THIS IS A UNIQUE AND CRUCIAL ELECTION FOR OUR COUNTRY
messages.content: By going to Brussels with a strong negotiating hand I can ensure we guarantee our economic security.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Securing a successful Brexit deal crucial for the nation's interest, security, and economic prosperity.

mentions.candidate: Edward Argar is mentioned as the Conservative Party candidate for Charnwood and is paired with Theresa May in delivering stable leadership for the constituency and Britain.
mentions.otherPartyLeaderCandidate: Jeremy Corbyn is mentioned as the leader of the Labour Party, with notes on the potential negative consequences if Labour wins the election.
mentions.partyLeader: Theresa May is mentioned as the Prime Minister and party leader of the Conservative Party.
mentions.tacticalSituation: The leaflet hints at tactical voting by suggesting that a vote for Corbyn would weaken Britain's position on Brexit and endorsing Edward Argar as the vote for a strong and stable government.

issues.brexitEurope: The leaflet emphasizes Brexit as the central issue, discussing the need for a successful Brexit for Britain's security and prosperity.
issues.economy: Mentions of economic security in association with a successful Brexit negotiation.
issues.governance: Promises stable leadership and governance in contrast to 'a coalition of chaos with Jeremy Corbyn'.

endorsements.endorsement: Urges voting for Edward Argar to ensure a strong and stable leadership for Charnwood and Britain, highlighting the importance of this election for Brexit negotiations.

quotes.text: YOUR SEAT COUNTS AND EVERY SINGLE VOTE WILL COUNT

The choice at this election is clear. Strong and stable leadership with me in the national interest to see us through Brexit and beyond, or a hung parliament and coalition of chaos with Jeremy Corbyn negotiating Brexit.

images.caption: Two contrasting images: One showing Theresa May and Edward Argar with the caption 'Theresa May and Edward Argar – Strong Leadership for Charnwood and for Britain', and the other depicting a 'Coalition of Chaos with Jeremy Corbyn'.

leaflet.additionalNotes: The leaflet has a strong focus on the implications of the general election for Brexit negotiations and uses the dichotomy of strong Conservative leadership versus the instability associated with the Labour Party.
